entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 07:29 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 07:29 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon.
